QuestData.Title: Breaching the Sanctum
QuestData.Description: It is time. Valtrois is ready to destroy the barrier guarding the breach in the Sanctum. I will teleport you to the breach, then it falls on you to secure the area.$b$bTake these telemancy orbs. If you find you need support, use them to summon Withered.$b$bWe must strike before the enemy can ready new defenses. Let me know when you are ready and we will begin.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Oculeth to start the assault.
QuestData.RewardText: I must commend your knack for overcoming adversity. Take your time gathering your fellow champions, $n, but don't take TOO long!
